domain.name: Person
domain.description: Named people in the world like Nelson Mandela

domain.name: Politician
domain.description: Politicians in the world, like Joe Biden

text: @GOPLeader Thank you Sir. As a toppled over slave trading statue I recognize your service for our bronze community. We have no flesh, no hearts, no kidneys to be damaged by Covid19. We do not breathe. We have no bones to be broken by police. Thank you for protecting us and not alive humans.
